header.title: Another Week of Madness? Another Reason to Free Your Mind!

title: Another Week of Madness? Another Reason to Free Your Mind!
content:
Has the craziness of politics gotten to you this week? <!--more--> Not a minute to lose, start your mind-readjustment program now to save your weekend!
It’s Free-Your-Mind Friday on Leid Stories—a pro bono service to those wanting to talk things through to quickly regain their political bearings.
Our method is quite effective; most people find themselves happily immune to the bloviators on weekend “analysis” shows.
Call in (888-874-4888) and share your considered thoughts and opinions.
A great weekend is in store.
